channel.title: 12 steps to become a 'better' web programmer & designer
channel.description:
Ahem... Hey you! Gonna post already? I been seeing 2 members viewing for 10 minutes now...wtf?
Well first of all, I want you all to know I didn't learn to become one by myself. My uncle taught me how to do it all, but im still learning. I'm just a rival trying to be one of the best programmers out there and I really like to design + program sites, so lets began already!
You can read all about this here where my uncle found it, hes always reading about getting better: http://www.ex-designz.net/articleread.asp?aid=324
[hr]
Also I just want to let everyone know that if you want to get a website design coded quickly then you may want to jot down some notes for yourself. Such as what color would the specific font(like link, links hovers, h1 colors) be. Its really good to draw a layout for your site too because not everyone come up with new ideas everyday, thats why you gotta draw the layout for yourself like this below i made, but i do mines with a pencil for the layout lol :P:
[IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii3/Ixl_photos/DesignExample.jpg[/img]

item.title: 12 steps to become a 'better' web programmer & designer
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

z0mg,
i read this pl0x.

teach me how?!

Read full topic

item.title: 12 steps to become a 'better' web programmer & designer
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“error.login, post:6, topic:179764”][quote author=goatee link=topic=240985.msg2041968#msg2041968 date=1202600484]
Doesn’t teach you anything about actual design. Teaches you about the design of your code but i was wanting methods on visual design.
[/quote]
here is what helps me think
the 3s’s (shit, shower and shave) that always refreshes me and helps me with ideas.[/quote]
Or a shank.
Shit shower wank.

Read full topic
